body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems          Â    The geology, soils, and unique micro-habitats of El Morro enrich this scenic and historic site. The geological formations that create "The Wall" are far more ancient than the inscriptions and wildlife found on them now.          The Pool An attraction for wildlife as well as thirsty explorers and pueblo inhabitants, the pool continues to be an important oasis. More->           Geologic Formations The exposed bedrock that forms El Morro has a long geologic history. More ->           Cryptobiotic Soils The soils are alive and fragile in this arid landscape.
